sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ShowingModel } from '../models/showing.model'; import { ShowingService } from '../services/showing.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sale', templateUrl: './sale.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sale.component.css'] }) export class SaleComponent implements OnInit { showings!: ShowingModel[]; selectedItem!: Number; rows= Array.from({length: 10}, (_, index) => index + 1); columns: String[] = ["A","B","C"]; constructor(private showingService : ShowingService){} ngOnInit(): void { //this.FullColumns(); try{ this.showingService.getShowings().subscribe(data=>{ this.showings = data; }); }catch(e){ console.log("error: "+ e); } } public onChange(){ console.log("ID Selected: "+this.selectedItem); this.showingService.getShowingById(this.selectedItem).subscribe(data=>{ console.log("Info getByID Showing: "+data); }); } private FullColumns(){ let start = 'A'; // letra de inicio let end = 'F'; // letra final for (let i = start.charCodeAt(0); i <= end.charCodeAt(0); i++) { this.columns.push(String.fromCharCode(i)); } } onClick(event: any) { console.log("El botón presionado es: " + event.target.id); // El botón presionado es: boton1 (o boton2, o boton3) } }
